publishedfiledetails.title: Peachy Vikings Decor
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1]Description[/h1]
This mod was created for RolePlayers (RP) who want additional decor. It was made to look Viking in style but works for any era. All items can be picked up and do not require foundations to place.

Please take the time to give the mod a thumbs up and rate it. 
[img=https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]

If you like the look of this mod make sure to Rate and Favorite it and Check out my other mods:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1491573333] PeachyFurniture [/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1482267887] PeachyWorktables [/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1517403145] Peachy Decor[/url]

[b] Mod ID 1587890586[/b]

Spawn codes and Engram list can be found in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/discussions/1587890586] Discussion Tab [/url]

[b]Thank you so much to the folks from [url=https://www.foxrp.net] www.FoxRP.net [/url] that helped with the testing. You guys are a great community![/b]

[h1]Peachy Viking Worktable[/h1] You need this item to craft all other Decor items.

[h1]Bones[/h1]
[list]
[*]Dear Skull
[*]Femer
[*]Group of Femers
[*]Human Skull
[*]Primate Skull
[*]Rhino Horn
[*]Small Animal Skull
[*]Stag Antler
[*]Tusks
[/list]
[h1]Containers[/h1]
[list]
[*]Carrot,Corn, Fruit, Portato, and Empty Crates
[*]Food Sacks
[*]Barrels x 2
[*]Wicker Baskets x 3
[/list]
[h1]Hides[/h1]
[list]
[*]Fur Rugs x3
[*]Hide Rugs x 2
[*]Fur wall Hanging x 3
[*]Hide wall Hanging x 2
[/list]
[h1]Furniture[/h1]
[list]
[*]King Size Beds x 2
[*]Double Beds x 2
[*]Single Bed
[*]Throne x 2
[*]Bench x 2
[*]Chair x 2
[/list]
[h1]Racks[/h1]
[list]
[*]Fish Rack
[*]Bird Rack
[*]Log Rack
[*]Hide Rack x 2
[*]Fur Rack x 2
[/list]
[h1]Dishes[/h1]
[list]
[*]Drinking Horns x 2
[*]Mugs x 2
[*]Wicker Plate
[/list]
[h1]Misc[/h1]
[list]
[*]Runes x 26 letters + 7 Words
[*]Flags x 5
[*]Idols x Wood 5 Horn x 5
[*]Fire pit
[*]Firepit stand
[*]Flat Rock Table
[*]Hay Bed and Pile
[*]Hide Lean tos x 2
[*]Stage
[*]Beer Barrel
[*]Cheese Table
[*]Stuffed Vulture
[*]Vulture foot
[/list]
